level.heading: Enforcement of Commissioner's orders or actions.
level.text: The Commissioner may, through the Corporation Counsel of the District, invoke the aid of any court of competent jurisdiction to enforce any order made or action taken by him in pursuance of law.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-268
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-268, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-4301.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Department of Insurance abolished: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-4301.
